ComicInfo.Title: Saving the Day
ComicInfo.Summary: Saving the Day: How do you fight an invasion of cartoon conquerors? The answer is revealed. Then, Mighty Mouse returns home to vanquish his own alien invaders, with a bit of assistance from our side of the dimensional barrier.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 00:23:53. [CVDB630555] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 07:16:58. [Issue ID 1743928]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Anthony Marques,Chris O'Halloran,Igor Lima,J. Bone,Peter Pantazis
ComicInfo.Characters: Officer Baker,Joey Malone,Officer Betances,Mrs. Malone,"boxer" dog (cartoons),alien cats,Warlord Felis Rex (leader of the alien cats),other students (humans),various cartoon mice,Colonel Morrissey,three school bullies,various citizens, police, military, and hospital emergency room personnel
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Rated A Appropriate for All Readers
